item.description:
Hello, I am a master student at Aalto University, welcome to my website! Right now I major in Robotics and Autonomous Systems, and my minor is Machine Learning (probably the de facto major ^-^). In my first year of master’s study, I’m taking intensive courses in mobile robotics and artificial intelligence, because I’m always eager to learn more about Robotics and AI and try to combine them together! With that enthusiasm, I completed 40ECTS in 2020Fall and got GPA 4.875 /5. In addition to course study, I’m academically mentored by Prof. Joni Pajarinen.

Before I came to Aalto, I got my bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering from Tongji University, where I focused my study on Mechatronics. Upon graduation, I ranked 3 /114 in my department with GPA 4.58 /5, and seized the award of Excellent Graduates in Shanghai. I completed two research programs, including my bachelor’s thesis, in Vision4Robotics Group under the supervision of Prof. Changhong Fu, and the projects were both centered on Visual Object Tracking.

For the rest of my study, I will concentrate more on the perception part of mobile robots, and apply machine learning techniques to them. You can find my latest resume here. Hoping to find relevant jobs and internships!
